QuestData.Title: Back to the Pit
QuestData.Description: To truly stay in your best riding shape you'll want to test yourself against the other Hyldnir every day.$B$BHead back into the Pit of the Fang and show them what you're capable of. They'll appreciate suffering defeat to one as skilled as yourself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gretta the Arbiter, in Brunnhildar Village, wants you to use the Reins of the Icemaw Matriarch inside the Pit of the Fang and defeat 6 Hyldsmeet Warbears.
QuestData.RewardText: You continue to demonstrate your prowess. Your sisters have not lost their respect for you.
